name: Soccer Messenger Game Pro
description:
The latest football/soccer game on the social media network has now arrived! Here it is!
- No ADS, no IAPs, no micro transactions, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements..
- Game runs on all iPhones, iPads and iPod Touches running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- Created by a developer with a heart
- If you like it, rate it and please try my other games too
- Enjoy
